content: When you're back up to the arch, continue forward to the top of the slope. The path goes left and right here. Right is the main path, so for now, let's take a look at the left side. As you head over, you'll see an Earth Rakshasa waiting for you that guards a chest. It also has a Spirit for you to collect once you defeat it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Flint Chief'.
The content is as follows:
When you're back up to the arch, continue forward to the top of the slope. The path goes left and right here. Right is the main path, so for now, let's take a look at the left side. As you head over, you'll see an Earth Rakshasa waiting for you that guards a chest. It also has a Spirit for you to collect once you defeat it.
